words.def: a fastener fitted to a door or drawer to keep it firmly closed
the state of needing something that is absent or unavailable
a metal cleat on the bottom front of a horseshoe to prevent slipping
tree bearing large brown nuts containing e.g. caffeine
fossil fuel consisting of carbonized vegetable matter deposited in the Carboniferous period
large genus of African trees bearing kola nuts
the hard durable wood of any oak
a Turkish unit of weight equal to about 2.75 pounds
Acacia koa, a species of large tree in the family Fabaceae which is endemic to and common on the islands of Hawaii; or the wood of this tree.
resinlike substance secreted by certain lac insects
South American wood sorrel cultivated for its edible tubers
a white soft metallic element that tarnishes readily
The Indian mulberry , , especially as used to make dye.
